subject: Politics
title: AI and Geopolitical Power
description: A quick win: understand AI and Geopolitical Power.

hook.text: Putin said whoever leads in AI will rule the world. The US and China are racing to prove him right.

buildup.text: Artificial intelligence is transforming warfare, surveillance, economics, and information control.

discovery.text: China uses AI for mass surveillance. The US uses it for military targeting. Both use it for economic advantage.

twist.text: AI arms control doesn't exist. Autonomous weapons that kill without human approval are already being developed.

climax.text: AI could shift power faster than nuclear weapons did. The nation that masters it first gains a massive advantage.

punchline.text: AI is the new arms race. The winners will shape the century.

quiz.question: Why is AI considered a geopolitical weapon?
options: It transforms warfare, surveillance, and economic competition between nations
It only affects social media and entertainment
All nations have agreed to ban AI from military use
